definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
foreign (non-Chinese)/barbarian/classifier for occurrences (of an event, action or speech utterance)/classifier for iterations: times, -fold (as in twofold etc)/classifier for situations: kind, sort

sentences.english: Using buffered factor could check and measure the content of fumet of passionflower juice.
sentences.chinese: 利用缓冲系数也可检测西番莲果汁饮料中原汁含量。

sentences.english: Drink valerian or passionflower (or passiflora) tea before bedtime every night for one month.
sentences.chinese: 坚持一个月在每晚临睡前饮用颉草茶或西番莲茶。

sentences.english: Unfolds with flavors of passion fruit, gooseberry and subtle herbaceousness.
sentences.chinese: 西番莲果，醋栗口味，并略带稀薄的草木香口感。

sentences.english: A nose of fresh lifted passion-fruit, melon and tropical fruits.
sentences.chinese: 蕴含一丝清新的西番莲果香及蜜瓜与热带水果芬芳。

sentences.english: Pineapple and passion fruit contribute the fruit salad impression joined by capsicum notes and lemon.
sentences.chinese: 波萝及西番莲果等水果沙拉味伴随着辣椒及柠檬味。

sentences.english: Technical processing of low-sugar preserved Passiflora edulis Sims was studied by use of Passiflora edulis Sims pericarp as starting material.
sentences.chinese: 以西番莲果皮为原料，研究了低糖果脯的加工工艺。

definition: aromatic herb/vanilla/alternative name for Eupatorium fortunei/(fig.) loyal and dependable person (old)
